sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Icon, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useRecoilState } from 'recoil' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { selected } from '../data/selected' import { config } from '../data/config' import { muteIndiv } from './Zoom' import { liveParticipants } from '../data/liveParticipants' export const Preview = () => { const [selectedState, setSelected] = useRecoilState(selected); const [wh, setwh] = useState(0); const [cf,] = useRecoilState(config); const [participantsData,] = useRecoilState(liveParticipants); let fullSelectedArray useEffect(() => { // recalculate number of rows/ columns when selections change if (cf){ setwh((Math.ceil(Math.sqrt(selectedState?.length)) ? Math.ceil(Math.sqrt(selectedState?.length)) : 1)) fullSelectedArray = selectedState.map(sel => participantsData?.filter(x=>x.userId===sel)[0]) } else{ setwh((Math.ceil(Math.sqrt(participantsData?.length)) ? Math.ceil(Math.sqrt(participantsData?.length)) : 1)) } //let h:number = (Math.ceil(selectedState.length / w) ? Math.ceil(selectedState.length / w) : 1) }, [selectedState, participantsData]) const removeFromState = (obj) => { //filter out removed item setSelected(selectedState.filter((item) => item.userId !== obj.userId)) } return ( <>
{cf ? selectedState?.map((sel) => <>
{sel.userName}
) : participantsData?.map((sel) => <>

{sel.userName}

muteIndiv(sel.userId, sel.muted ? false : true)} size='large' >
)}
) }
